title: Gavin Van Vlack from Burn & Absolution
itunes:title: Gavin Van Vlack from Burn & Absolution
description:
Happy new year! This week I hop on the phone with Gavin Van Vlack who is the guitarist for the much respected and revered bands Burn and Absolution. It was a very inspirational chat that hits on New York City hardcore, being a movement enthusiast and how to say engaged and inspired. A crucial listen. - - - -This weeks show is brought to you by Level Up, by Loot Crate which wants to hook you up with all of the coolest pop culture gear. For 10% off your first purchase use the code WORDSFollow the show on TwitterEmail the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
